channel.title: On The List TV (Small Quicktime)
channel.description: On The List TV is an Internet TV show that is dedicated to exploring what is out on the horizon of the greater Detroit area. Whether it be fashion, food, quirky spots, hot spots, night spots or fun things to enjoy in the culture of Detroit and Michigan as a whole, we want to showcase it to give you a taste. So your hosts Domenic D'Amico and Tiffany Stone will put them On the List and try to give you the in’s and out’s.
channel.itunes:subtitle: On The List TV - Detroit (Small Quicktime)
channel.itunes:summary: On The List TV is an Internet TV show that is dedicated to exploring what is out on the horizon of the greater Detroit area. Whether it be fashion, food, quirky spots, hot spots, night spots or fun things to enjoy in the culture of Detroit and Michigan as a whole, we want to showcase it to give you a taste. So we will put them On the List and try to give you the in’s and out’s.
channel.itunes:author: On The List TV
channel.itunes:keywords: Detroit, On The List, Real Detroit Weekly, Fashion, Clubs, Nightlife, Interviews, Party, Events, Drinking, restaurants, places, travel, michigan

image.title: On The List TV (Small Quicktime)
image.description: Your all access pass to a good time!

item.title: On The List TV - Ep 48 - Blue Carpet Film Network – Elysium Detroit
item.description: The first annual Blue Carpet Film Network in Detroit at Elysium Lounge had OnTheList.TV schmoozing with newly crowned Miss Michigan USA Channing Pierce, FOX 2 and 100.3 WNIC Morning host Jay Towers as he hosted the night for local actors, producers and filmmakers. The night was heavily being promoted for Casino Blues a new feature being shot in Michigan, but we were able to talk some of the upcoming movers and shakers in our lovely city of Detroit.
item.itunes:subtitle: The first annual Blue Carpet Film Network in Detroit at Elysium Lounge
item.itunes:summary: The first annual Blue Carpet Film Network in Detroit at Elysium Lounge had OnTheList.TV schmoozing with newly crowned Miss Michigan USA Channing Pierce, FOX 2 and 100.3 WNIC Morning host Jay Towers as he hosted the night for local actors, producers and filmmakers. The night was heavily being promoted for Casino Blues a new feature being shot in Michigan, but we were able to talk some of the upcoming movers and shakers in our lovely city of Detroit.
item.itunes:author: On The List TV
item.itunes:keywords: casino, detroit, elysium, film, fox2, host, jay, networking, producers, towers, wnic

item.title: On The List TV - Ep 47 - Bitter Boat Singles Mingle – Mojo In The Morning
item.description: You know it’s going to be a great episode when you put 300 bitter single people on the Ovation Yacht with music, dancing and drinking. Come and mingle with Domenic from OnTheList.TV and ICE from Channel 955 and Flavor of Love 3, as they talk dating life with some of Detroit’s eligible single. Plus it features Detroit’s Hottest morning show, Mojo in The Morning with Mojo, Spike, Shannon and Rob.
item.itunes:subtitle: You know it’s going to be a great episode when you put 300 bitter single people on the Ovation Yacht with music, dancing and drinking.

item.title: On The List TV - Ep 46 - Flo Rida – Club can’t handle me w/Brilliance & Benni-e
item.description: OnTheList.TV episode 46 and we get a chance to speak with hit singles maker Flo Rida after a show at Clutch Cargo’s. Plus we interview Detroit’s own hit makers Brilliance and Benni-e Blanco. This is presented by Channel 955 (95.5) and hosted by Tiffany Stone.
item.itunes:subtitle: We get a chance to speak with hit singles maker Flo Rida after a show at Clutch Cargo’s. Plus we interview Detroit’s own hit makers Brilliance and Benni-e Blanco. This is presented by Channel 955 (95.5) and hosted by Tiffany Stone.

item.title: On The List TV - Ep 45 - Backstage for Mike Posner, JLS, New Boyz – Buda Blast
item.description: OnTheListTV and Channel 955 bring you a great episode where we head backstage to see Michigan’s own Mike Posner, JLS, New Boyz and Bei Maejor at the Fillmore Detroit, MI. Courtesy of the Buda Blast with Buda himself along with Lovely. Hosted by Tiffany Stone.

item.title: On The List TV - Ep 44 - Flying High at the Red Bull Air Races 2010
item.description: A quick episode takes us to the Detroit Riverfront for the Red Bull Air Races in 2010. We check out some of the races and interview the dancing kid from DEMF. Also Channel 955 joins us and Royal Dutchess Inc dresses Tiffany up.

item.title: On The List TV - Ep 43 - CODA, Statesmen VS. Celebrity Charity Basketball game.
item.description: On The List TV Host Domenic D’Amico and Special Guest Carey Torrice, head to Troy, MI for CODA's charity basketball game between the Statesmen Vs. local Celebrities. We met a lot of people for this great turnout and special charity for this great cause. CODA specializes in helping orphan dwarfs find a loving home.

item.description: On The List TV Host Domenic D’Amico and Special Guest Rob the WebGuy from Channel 955’s Mojo in the Morning Show decided to enter the mayhem of a pajama party at V inside MGM Detroit and interview people partying. We also talk to Spike, Kyra and Mojo.

item.title: On The List TV - Ep 40 - Parades, Beer and Clovers in Corktown
item.description: For this St Patricks Episode instead of a bar, we took it to the streets in Corktown, Detroit for the annual parade. It brings the very best and fun out of people, so we decided to capture the willing to be on camera for it all. Drive safe this year!

item.title: On The List TV - Ep 39 - Pajama's Lingerie Singles w/ MojoInTheMorning
item.description: Episode 39 brings us back to Mojo in the Morning's annual Pajama Singles Mingle. This time at Amnesia inside the MotorCity Casino in Detroit, MI. Domenic interviews the minglers along with 955's Rob The WebGuy & Shannon. Performance by Kevin Rudolf and Brilliance w/Lewd Society.

item.title: On The List TV - Ep 38 - Skating, Caroling & Xmas lights Holiday Show
item.description: Our big Holiday episode is packed to the top as we go rollerskating for the Xmas Bash in Farmington, MI. Tiffany checks out some big xmas lights in Royal Oak and also bring you Macomb County's Commissioner Carey Torrice to go caroling with Domenic!!

item.description: Since Tiffany Stone became a cohost with Domenic D'Amico on episode 28, we decided to air out some laundry with some deleted scenes that didn't make the cut along with screw up outtakes up to episode 36. Enjoy!

item.title: On The List TV - Ep 36 - Work in Movies! Center for Film Studies
item.description: Michigan is becoming the Hollywood of the Midwest as of late and a lot of unemployed people have been using their skills to train at the Center for Film studies to be on movie sets! We take a tour of the school to find out what it takes to graduate!

item.title: On The List TV - Ep 35 - Little Black Dress Party with Mojo in the Morning
item.description: OnTheList.TV was invited over the weekend to shoot an episode with Mojo in Morning radio show at SoundBoard inside the MotorCity Casino in Detroit. Special Performances included, IYAZ, Kristinia Debarge and Jason Derulo. Plus girls wore lil black dresses.

item.title: On The List TV - Ep 34 - Trick or Treating like a kid again
item.description: As part of our Fall episodes; Tiffany and Domenic get in costume, roam the streets of Metro Detroit, talk to some candy go-getters and givers while trying to collect their own candy throughout the Halloween night. They also learn the origin of pumpkins!
item.itunes:subtitle: Tiffany and Domenic get in costume, roam the streets of Metro Detroit Trick or Treating

item.itunes:keywords: trick, treat, candy, parents, kids, bags, givers, spooky, pumpkins

item.title: On The List TV - Ep 33 - Getting Scared by being Slaughtered at Sundown
item.description: A great part of fall is Halloween and in that tradition there is going to haunted houses. Domenic decided to hit the boonies and head to Slaughtered at Sundown's Haunted House and Hayride and ask what scares them the most and how scared people get.
item.itunes:subtitle: A great part of fall is Halloween and in that tradition there is going to haunted houses.

item.title: On The List TV - Ep 32 - Roaring Tailgaters in Detroit for the Lions
item.description: It's another great Fall episode as OnTheListTV decided to tailgate for the home opener of the Lions football in downtown Detroit in the area of Winder and Beaubien. Everyone showed us how they tailgate in their own way in hopes for a better Lions season.
item.itunes:subtitle: It's another great Fall episode as OnTheListTV decided to tailgate for the home opener of the Lions football

item.itunes:keywords: detroit, downtown, lions, football, fall, tailgate, beer, food

item.title: On The List TV - Ep 31 - Cider & Donut Time at Franklin Cider Mill
item.description: Fall is upon us in late September and that means one of the things to enjoy is Cider and Donuts! We take a tour at the famous Franklin Cider Mill in Franklin, MI. to see how Cider is made all while Domenic and Tiffany have fun with patrons & workers.
item.itunes:subtitle: Fall is upon us in late September and that means one of the things to enjoy is Cider and Donuts! We take a tour at the famous Franklin Cider Mill in Franklin, MI. to see how Cider is made all while Domenic and Tiffany have fun with patrons & workers.

item.title: On The List TV - Ep 30 - Touring the sizzling Westin Book Cadillac Hotel in Detroit
item.description: The Westin group took a huge risk at restoring the once famed hotel and turned it into the Westin Book Cadillac Detroit Hotel. From the looks of it, they did an extraordinary job in preserving and giving it style. On the List TV was lucky enough to get a great tour and roam free about the hotel to give a little insight into the history of the hotel while showing off the decor, ballrooms, hotel rooms and even a condo that sits on one of the top levels of the Book Cadillac. There was so much to this hotel that Domenic and Tiffany may go back for seconds in a later episode...tune in to find out.
item.itunes:subtitle: In a prior snackisode we were at the "Access Detroit" Free concert for the opening of this beautifully restored and renovated landmark in downtown Detroit, Michigan.

item.title: On The List TV - Ep 29 - Hot Sexy August Night Fun at Sukho Lounge
item.description: Episode 29 of OnTheListTV - Tiffany invites you into the Sukho Lounge in Rochester, MI. A Hot August night brings you an all access pass to music, flair bartenders, magicians and Domenic trying to get into the party! Does he end up making it in??

item.title: On The List TV - Ep 28 - Shopping at Russell Bazaar in Detroit MI
item.description: Welcome to Season 3 (Episode 28) of On the List TV with Domenic D’Amico and new co-host Tiffany Stone. Sure you’ve seen Tiffany as a guest of OTL on 2 other episodes, but now she’s made it a home! Along with Domenic, they will explore more than just bars and clubs around town. Sure those were exciting and who doesn’t love talking to people hopped up on booze?Ok so Episode 28, we’ve decided to hit up the Russell Bazaar shops at the Russell Bazaar center. Tiffany looks for some new goodies while Domenic fumbles around and stumbles into some lingerie from Bodacious U and Highway Printing’s Detroit Shirts. Tiffany also finds a good cause from one of the shops as they sell products from Africa and send proceeds back to help out. Plus we check out a piece of art and get the scoop on it from the Russell Gallery!
item.itunes:subtitle: Ok so Episode 28, we've decided to hit up the Russell Bazaar shops at the Russell Bazaar center. Tiffany looks for some new goodies while Domenic fumbles around

Tiffany also finds a good cause from one of the shops as they sell products from Africa and send proceeds back to help out. Plus we check out a piece of art and get the scoop on it from the Russell Gallery!
item.itunes:author: On The List TV
item.itunes:keywords: barber ,bazaar ,charity ,clothes , guitar , lingerie ,russell ,shopping

item.title: On The List TV - Ep 27 - Roller Skating Bonanza Bday at Bonaventure
item.description: Episode 27, hosts Domenic D'Amico and Tiffany Stone slip into some skates and slide on the rink for Detroit's own Jevon Hollywood and DJ Mike Scroggs Annual Rollerskating Disco Bday Bash. Then go On The Scene to find partiers in costume during the mayhem at Farmington Hills, MI, Bonaventure Roller Rink. Domenic also runs into On The List TV fan, ICE aka Amanda from VH1's Flavor of Love 3 and I Love Money 2, but she's disguised, shhhhh. Incase you didn't read or notice, Tiffany Stone, local model (Maxim, Greektown Casino, Toyo Tires, etc.) from Detroit makes her second appearance as co-host to Domenic D'Amico. On the List TV asked her oddly enough to do this show on skates, much like the Campus Marius Ice Skating episode. Call it an initiation for Tiffany if you must or simply a coincidence. Either way she holds her own against Domenic and gets in the rough of it during some rowdy interviews. You can also check out her other work and print work at www.tiffany-stone.com
item.itunes:subtitle: Domenic D'Amico and Tiffany Stone slip into some skates and slide on the rink for Detroit's own Jevon Hollywood and DJ Mike Scroggs Annual Rollerskating Disco Bday Bash.

item.title: On The List TV - Ep 26 - The Blarney Stone on St Patty's Day
item.description: Top O' the Mornin' to ya! Or evening? Because that's when On the List TV made it out to the Blarney Stone in Berkley, Michigan this past St. Patricks day. Domenic worked the room alone this episode, co-hostless, running wild in the sea of green beer and men ready to attack after binge drinking all day. Watch this episode to see if Domenic makes it out alive! Thanks to Dottie and Renee for setting up this show for us.
item.itunes:subtitle: Top O' the Mornin' to ya! Or evening? Because that's when On the List TV made it out to the Blarney Stone in Berkley, Michigan this past St. Patricks day.

item.title: On The List TV - Ep 25 - Farewell Tony Finch! at Club 22
item.description: It's a sad farewell to our good friend Tony Finch as he hosts the On The List TV for the last time. His going away party takes place at Club 22 in Shelby Township, Michigan where Domenic D'Amico goes On The Scene to get well wishes from all of Tony's friends.

item.title: On The List TV - Ep 24 - Campus Martius Ice Skating Rink
item.description: Welcome to the new year everyone! On the List TV decided to go Ice Skating at Campus Martius in Downtown Detroit with some of our fans who joined us out on the rink to skate and make this a fun episode to be a part of. Tiffany Stone from Maxim's Hometown Hottie 2008 Finalists joins the guys as a special guest host giving you the It Factor at the ice rink while Tony Finch and Domenic deliver the goods on the atmosphere and refreshments. Don't forget to bundle up during this january episode as On the List TV starts off 2009! Your all access pass to a good time!

item.title: On The List TV - Ep 23 - Ernie's in Clinton Township
item.description: This week On The List TV goes to Ernies in Clinton Township, Michigan. Domenic D'Amico & Tony Finch check out the complex which includes a Mediterranean style restaurant and nightclub. They also visit the wine room and go On The Scene with some fine patrons.

item.title: On The List TV - Ep 22 - Slaughtered at Sundown Haunted House and Hayride
item.description: Episode 22 brings us that time of season of fall with cider, donuts and haunted houses before halloween! We decided to check out one of the top 10 Haunted Houses in Michigan, Slaughtered at Sundown. Domenic and Tony Finch venture through both spooktaculars and live to interview people in line and throughout the establishment. Plus they put more things to the pimp list and get off your high horse. The show was also sponsored by Bocci Salon and Spa.

item.title: On The List TV - Ep 21 - Mojo in The Mornings - Booze Cruise Singles Mingle
item.description: Episode 21, Season 2 and already local celebs are in the house! We're speaking of radio's Channel 955 , the morning crew at Mojo in the Morning. Once again throwing another singles mingle to get the boys and girls together! This time around though it was on a boat, the Detroit Princess on the Detroit River. Domenic and Tony Finch talk about the party, how to get in and go live on the scene to encounter the many single people looking for a good time. The show was also sponsored by AG Photography (vipafterdark.com) and Bocci Salon and Spa.

item.title: On The List TV - Ep 20 - The Strip, Las Vegas, NV
item.description: So we've been gone for over a month and half and decided to start off our so called Season 2 with Episode 20 on the strip of Las Vegas, NV. Domenic and Tony through sketch show you how to have fun on the strip doings things under $25. Plus ending the show with Jamie Foxx at TAO nightclub in the Venetian, giving his best rendition of Goldigger. Now on our Season 2 we have tailored the show to being 10 minutes and under, so welcome back and enjoy!
item.itunes:subtitle: Season 2 with Episode 20 on the strip of Las Vegas, NV. Domenic and Tony through sketch show you how to have fun on the strip

item.title: On The List TV - Ep 19 - The Bank, Mt. Clemens
item.description: After about 2 years, Ronny Masters and Alex Kristoff pulled off something that's been lacking for a long time in Mt. Clemens, and that was upscale. Mt. Clemens is blessed with a country bar, the 18 and up mega club, an irish pub and many more, but upscale was lacking, let's face it. Domenic and Tony Finch actually experienced the club first hand while it this "old bank" was being renovated, they even tried to help name the place. After 2 months of being open we finally were able to get a show there, and what a show it was, with the fancy decor, bottle service, pretty people and Domenic's birthday. The night ended with intense energy to party more. Check out the show with interviews, the talk of the Bank, the large outdoor patio areas and a fun time. Plus we end the show on a surprising note...check it out!
item.itunes:subtitle: After about 2 years, Ronny Masters and Alex Kristoff pulled off something that's been lacking for a long time in Mt. Clemens, and that was upscale.

Plus we end the show on a surprising note...check it out!
item.itunes:author: On The List TV
item.itunes:keywords: Bank, class, club, girls, interviews, upscale, nightclub, birthday

item.title: On The List TV - Ep 18 - War of The Pour Bartending Competition Finals
item.description: It took 7 weeks in a span of two months to come to the conclusion in crowning Metro Detroit's Best Bartender in Real Detroit Weeky's War of the Pour. On the List TV shot the show Live on Clutch Cargo's main stage while the competition was going on and this was largely due to Domenic and Tony Finch hosting the 7 week event, so it was fitting. Jenny D joins us as she interviews some of the finalists and hops into the Bacardi Rolls Royce. We also showcase the 6 weeks that led up to the finals, plus we can't leave a show untouched without putting something on the Pimp List and knocking something off the High Horse. Then we conclude the show with the 2008 Winner from War of the Pour! A fantastic show and it's always getting better!
item.itunes:subtitle: It took 7 weeks in a span of two months to come to the conclusion in crowning Metro Detroit's Best Bartender in Real Detroit Weeky's War of the Pour.

item.itunes:author: On The List TV
item.itunes:keywords: Real, Detroit, War, Pour, bartending, competition, rolls, royce, bacardi, live

item.title: On The List TV - Ep 17 - Red Bull Air Race - Detroit, Michigan
item.description: Episode 17 of OTL landed us with our friends at Red Bull for the Air Race World Series as they competed in front of a Detroit, Michigan/Windsor, Ontario crowd. Domenic and Tony Finch talk a little about the city, the air race, the scene and atmosphere, while Jenny gets the real scoop by chatting it up with a few of this years air racers. Plus its another week of adding to "the pimp list" and "Get off your high horse". Check it out to see who made it and get a segment full of flying planes!
item.itunes:subtitle: Episode 17 of OTL landed us with our friends at Red Bull for the Air Race World Series as they competed in front of a Detroit, Michigan/Windsor, Ontario crowd.

item.itunes:keywords: red, bull, air, race, detroit, downtown, mike, mangold, kirby, chambliss

item.title: On The List TV - Ep 16 - Movement 08 - Detroit Electronic Music Festival
item.description: Movement 08, The Detroit Electronic Music Festival at Hart Plaza in Downtown Detroit during Memorial Weekend was the set of our latest Episode 16 for On the List TV. We found ourselves overlooking the main stage and feeling the thumping beats of the many electronic songs produced and provided by a lot of the talented DJ's who were present throughout the festival. Jenny was out checking the fashion while Domenic and Tony Finch walked around Hart Plaza hitting up a few attendees.
item.itunes:subtitle: Movement 08, The Detroit Electronic Music Festival at Hart Plaza in Downtown Detroit's Movement 08 during Memorial Weekend was the set of our latest Episode 16 for On the List TV.

item.title: On The List TV - Ep 15 - JDs Key Club - Pontiac, Michigan
item.description: Episode 15 of On the List TV found us right in the middle of a dueling piano bar in Pontiac, Michigan for a little known place called, JD's Key Club. Request your song on a napkin with some washingtons and hear it moments later! Domenic and Tony Finch go on the scene and find themselves on the piano's during a tribute to Top Gun as they play the Meg Ryan character. Jenny gets the Real Scoop talking to the actual musicians to find out the right way and best ways to get your song played. So sit back, watch us, sing along and then go out for a night of fun to get your social life going.
item.itunes:subtitle: Episode 15 of On the List TV found us right in the middle of a dueling piano bar in Pontiac, Michigan.

item.title: On The List TV - Ep 14 - Bonaventure Roller Rink
item.description: When was the last time you went Roller Skating? Yes it still goes on even after you are 15 years old. Domenic and Tony reminisce the old days, talk about the current night while Jenny learns to backwards skate. Domenic also talks to Flavor of Love 3's own ICE while even knocking Flavor Flav off his high horse and in roller skating fashion Tony Finch puts a special girl on the Pimp List!

item.title: On The List TV - Ep 13 - Coyote Joes, Shelby, MI
item.description: On The List TV decided to check out the country scene by partying it up at Coyote Joes. We talk to frequent patrons, talk about Country music of today and Jenny tries to Line dance. Plus we continue with two new short segments called "The Pimp List and Get off your High Horse!" Hear who Domenic and Tony highlight this week!

item.title: On The List TV - Ep 12 - Fubar, Pontiac, MI
item.description: On The List TV got a chance to be at a Grand Opening of a new bar in Pontiac, MI. Think of the word FU brought up in every form imaginable. Thats the idea Domenic and Finch got as they even bring you a 60's style instructional video on what to do at Fubar. Jenny D also joins the crew again to give you more insight on Fubar and even its Menu. Plus we introduce two new short segments called "The Pimp List and Get off your High Horse!"

item.description: On The List TV celebrated St. Patty's Day at one of Detroit's Finest Irish Pubs. The Old Shillelagh which is the only Irish Pub in Greektown. Tony Finch and Domenic take in the festivities, talk about the pub, enjoy some beer and say cheers to many patrons.

item.title: On The List TV - Ep 9 - Guys weekend in Northern Michigan
item.description: On The List TV decided to take a guys weekend with some of their close friends who are married or involved and don't get to go out much to have a booze filled time of beer pong, beer bong, poker and of course drunk sledding. Domenic and Tony obviously talk about being up north while doing Domenic's signature Italian shots of Rum and Pear.
